data.title: Otto A. Horger, Jr. Obituary
data.meta_description: Read the obituary of Otto Alfred Horger Jr. (1945 - 2023) from Warren, MI. Leave your condolences and send flowers to the family to show you care.
data.text:
Otto Alfred Horger, Jr., 77, passed away Monday, February 20, 2023. Otto was born August 30, 1945 to the late Otto Alfred and Ida Regine “Pitzi” (nee Meister) Horger. Beloved husband of Debra. Adored father of Sherry (David) Laitinen,... View Obituary & Service Information

Share a Memory Below

A comforting word from you means a lot.
